Ghost Ship Rules

Type

Graphic Design

Date

19.12.2024

Scale

289 x 380 mm

Know-How

Poster Design

This graphic design project explores three words: "Ghost," "Ship," and "Rules", through a combination of imagery and typography. These concepts are developed across four poster variations, each playing with their semantic meaning and visual interpretation.
